analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#376-404) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#398-401)
	-token.mint(bounty,bountyAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#401)
	-token.mint(team,teamAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#401-402)
	-token.mint(reserve,reserveAmount) (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#402-403)

BARTokenSale._cap should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#463-464)
BARTokenSale._endTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#462-463)
BARTokenSale._rate should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#463)
BARTokenSale._startTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#458-462)
BARTokenSale._wallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#464-465)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/27/0x5af294caf640339350f8224a8c78b7cdb6ce22ab.sol#129-130) is not in mixedCase
